reviews.review: jogo foda que roda em qualquer pc por 37 reais varias horas de diversao

i cannot recommend this game to other people bc it has so many bugs i stopped playing this game for months and now come back to it with a couple of friends hoping it would be less buggy and we could play a match together but guess what..
if you queue with 2 people you might only have to wait a minute at max but as soon as you are with 3 prepare to wait for more than 10 min atleast that's how it is at the moment of writing the review, now that doesn't even get me started with the matchmaking... it's horrible it puts you as a survivor with barely anything unlocked against a killer with all his perks maxed and this is 90 percent of your games basically, that said sometimes you can still have fun if the servers aren't lagging you to death which makes it impossible to juke or even escape from the killer if it isn't the killer himself lagging, there is also little to no punishment to deserters even after it takes a lot of time to find a game if you are looking with friends, there is also the really annoying fact that you sometimes bug out and can't do anything anymore in the game... i was pretty hyped to see how this game would turn out and would have supported the devs more but if you pump out dlcs with more maps,killers and survivors instead of putting them in the orginal game and you don't even fix all of your GAME BREAKING BUGS i don't think you deserve it.
najlepsza gra

Love the game!
The game`s graphics are amazing, the sound makes it sound like you really hit somebody and bashed their skull with a hammer or any other weapon! The maps are amazing and matches perfectly to the game and the characters. You have many options to choose, many survivor characetrs and some few killers. You can also customize them and their weapons, but you need to have the items. The game also has a nice detector for killers, when a killer is close to you, you will hear heart beats, the closer the killer is, the faster the heart beats. It really makes your adrenaline pump throught your heart.
And no bugs so far.
游戏是好游戏~只是有些玩家素质太低，拉低了游戏的可玩性。不过还是挺好玩的，喜欢逃生游戏的可以入手~

I feel like a hypocrite to not recommend this game despite having played so many hours, but the truth is my playtime reflects the addictiveness of the game and not necessarily my enjoyment factor. I really want to like the game, but I just find the developers really struggle with the balancing of the game, and oftentimes community complaints about grievous balance issues between survivors and killer are met with overcompensation, causing the scales to tip in the other direction, and any attempts to deal with griefing/exploiting/bad sportsmanship in the game are dealt with using very band-aid type practices rather than addressing the root of the problem.

You might have read about face-camping, pallet looping, body-blocking, lag switching, etc etc. Well yes, it all exists, but even worse is that a large portion of the gamebase has grown toxic from having to deal with these issues unresolved for so long. Distrust and resentment between killer and survivors players have grown to such a stage that now you will even be called a camper or pallet looper, etc when you do no such thing. But I don't put the blame on the community; I think the issues lie with the game's poor balancing.

The final disappointment for me was seeing all the expansions that DBD are pushing out, which just adds more unbalancing bugs to the game when they really haven't resolved all the original gripes. I also really hated the movie/game tie-ins, which feel to me very much like a cash grab. I would totally believe the influencing factor behind these decisions were the publisher, Starbreeze Studios, rather than the devs, as SS had a similar model with PayDay2 where they pimped there game out with every possible tie-in they could get their hands on.

In the end, I definitely had a lot of great, adrenaline pumping games in DBD, played with a lot of amazing killers and survivors, but more games than not, my experience was rage inducing, frustrating and unsatisfying.

Nach fast einem Jahr macht es immer noch Spaß zu spielen, ich glaube das spricht für sich. Natürlich gibt es immer mal Probleme mit op Killern oder Überlebenden, aber es wird ja auch noch weiterhin am Spiel gearbeitet.

This game has the potential to be the single best game that anyone in their right mind has ever played. Unfortunately it has been ruined by a man who, by his own admission, sniffs underwear, both used and unused, all day. His partner in crime for this gruesome debacle of which a likeness has never before been seen is another man who gets second dibs on said underwear. While engaging in perverse debauchery they dream up ideas that a Pre-School Nursery class tutored by dogs and graded by the UK Office for Standards in Education, Children's Services and Skills as "Excessively Deficient" would take one look at and produce the large red "Denied" stamp before applying said stamp to the skull of these clowns.

Their idea for creating "a Killer who will be so OP" could not have been further from the intended had it been designed by Ben Brode himself with the exception of an extremely overpowered bugged farming tool which was patched out a week later thus making said OP pick only slightly less shit and current bottom tiered Wraith. Meanwhile they allow other killers to go with balance akin to that of a fully armed Trident Nuclear Missile versus a Shepherd armed only with a handful of leaves and a bent twig.

You'd assume that with a rival around the corner that you would be doing everything in your power to ensure that your product was top of the line, the highest grade, the best around. Instead they seem to have heavily banked on the idea that because their game is so shit it will have scared away not only the competitors of such games but also the playerbase, thus creating a self-depricating monopoly whereby the only userbase they have left are those who have not yet perfected the art of pepperoni nipples for their Deviantart pornography page.

All in all the approach to bugfixing in this game appears to be "HAHA WHAT BUGS?!". There is no real Anti-Cheat making it a simple case of turning off the Steam Cloud to avoid Easy Anti Cheat bans and due to the lack of dedicated servers you can only be matched with someone on the surface of the moon. Therefore making it easily the best game I have ever played. My last stream of this game broke the all time viewer record with a peak of 2 when I checked the quality of the stream with my phone and it gave me another viewer.

My Rating for this game? 10/10 would catch the turd with my mouth again.

Даже учитывая все баги, всех отсталых людей, которые купили зачем-то эту игру и портят другим игрoкам жизнь своей человеческой глупостью, эта игра великолепна! Да, ты будешь часто батхертить как тварь, но когда будет отличный катыч с твоими  друзями - это буря радости и смеха! Это того стоит : D

Не покупайте эту игру. Если раньше новичкам реально было подняться, сейчас уже нет. Почему? Во-первых, сам по себе адовый поиск лобби будет вас закидывать к маньякам высоких рангов. Во-вторых, баланс всё больше и больше склоняют в пользу донных маньяков. Хотя, на мой взгляд, чтобы проиграть на маньяке нужно быть либо конченным дауном, либо кеймпером. Теперь, дорогой мой новичок, ты будешь сливать и сливать, сливать и сливать...

我老家曾经流传过一段时间的“红狗”的传说。

说是曾经那里有过一个地下斗狗场，开斗狗场的老板是个变态，不但斗狗，还虐狗吃狗。

有好事者曾记录下他吃狗的过程：先架了大锅，水烧开，然后放狗出来互相撕咬，一次要放很多只。狗都是饿了很多天的，红着眼睛，凶狠异常，只要咬到就撕扯下肉来吃，全然不顾自己身上的鲜血淋漓。这样斗狗就像养蛊，到最后只会剩下一只。

那个狗场老板把这种狗叫做“厉”。因为这种斗到最后的狗身上一定全都是血，外面人也把这种狗叫红狗。

老板只吃红狗。

为什么说他变态，是因为他吃狗的时候，把红狗直接烫死，然后放到蚁窝边上，等狗上面爬满蚂蚁，再生吃蚂蚁。

这个变态老板有一次和他狗场的伙夫起了矛盾，大闹一场之后，伙夫被赶出去了，丢了工作，自然怀恨在心，时常想着报复。

但是老板势大，寻常手段奈何不了他。这伙夫就一直等着，时不时进山里去个几天，也不知道在干什么。

有一年，突然听说那个老板死了。而且死的很奇怪，人人都知道是伙夫干的，但是整个事情和他完全扯不上关系。

可以说是很离奇了。

老板是在吃狗的时候被狗咬死的，准确的来说，是红狗突然发狂咬死的。

据那天在场的人说，老板按平时的方法，等红狗累的动不了之后再靠近它，可是那天突然飞来一只鹰，扔了一个东西刚好落在老板的身上，那只狗就突然暴起咬死了老板，咬死之后还在尸体上趴了很久，最终被打死的时候也没有离开尸体。

扔下去的那个东西被狗吃掉了，也没有人知道是什么。

而那个伙夫，当天就离开了当地。

很多年后，有一个奇怪的人回来了，说要看一看当年的狗场。看完之后，沉默了很久。当地人看他奇怪，就问他知不知道当年的事情，他就把当年伙夫的手法说了出来。

伙夫在山里养了一只鹰，专门训练这只鹰叼东西，他知道老板吃的都是公狗，所以当天，伙夫杀了一只母狗，把带有母狗气味的升值器切割下来，让鹰叼去甩给老板，最后那只公狗被气味刺激，必然暴起杀人，这样无迹可寻的手段，就算人人知道他从中作梗也没有证据。

那人长叹一声，这真是：


狗厉锅架生噬蚁，奇鹰伙夫逼取之。..
Pros and cons to this game, I will always love this game and always play it atleast once every two weeks since I bought it in Beta.

So, where do i start, i'll start with the game itself. 
The game is inredibly fun, entertaining and just nice to play 
Sometime you shit your pants, but that's something you msut be prepared for 

But now....i'll get to the darker side of this game... 

THE COMMUNITY 

The Community is AWFUL, in my screenshots you can see Killer standing in front of my friend, preventing us from unhooking him because of the action taking place in front of the survivor where you cant get because of the killer. 

The Survivors are other thing entirely, rarely they would help you, heal you and actually you would had a pretty good game 
[spoiler]Only that's like 1 of 15 games[/spoiler]

So in the conclusion, the game itself is great and i love the concept, but the community is killing it 
So, after many hours in the game, im sad i cant recommend it, you will rage more often then you will enjoy the gameplay, all thanks to the nice community we have here :)

Nice game

Awesome game for people who like to play unfair games. There are various aspects that keep it spicy like items and offerings with effects reaching from oviously too strong to not noticeable. The variety of characters and perks/addons is also steady growing to make the game more confusing and the money you can spend on the game increases expotential with the shop. Basicly there are 3 gamemode, but the third one is only unlocked when you got some friend who like to torture themselfes with you.

The gamemode number one is to play killer. There you can deside wich kind of unfair experiece you want to have, for example you can play a basicly very weak killer without a remarkable ability to get rewarded very low in comparision to your reward when you are playing a killer who can use a slightly limited speedhack to hunt people down. The best thing is the variety of strong and weak abilities wich got also a steady loss of differences to each other the more killers release and arbitrary nerfes or buffs wich doesnt improve the balancing keep the playstyle optimization on specific caracters a never ending story. Additionaly to the choice of power you want your killer to have without addons you can of course still use addons and offerings wich can decide the game before it begins on almost every killer. Dont be afraid that you would need to read all of the textboxes popping up hovering over brown poop just click on the colours green, purple and red while choosing them. 

The second class or better called the primate class is playing survivor by clicking on find a match while there are still 3 black guys with a plus standing next to them because they are friendless mobbing victims searching for another groub of bullies killing them.

The third one getting unlocked beeing socialized with people who like to tryhard without getting rewarded for it, is the one the game was balanced for, if you are good at lying to yourself. You can look forward to play against killers who decided to play a weak killer and collect rusian quality salt from kids, or offer some salt to people who like to play strong killers optimal by clicking on their red stuff in the offering or the addon selection. However the afterchat looks like, you are right because your friends will agree with anything you say, to show the killer that he isnt liked by the people he killed or tried to kill and even when the match was fun for everyone you can still make sure that the afterchat is salty enough to leave by writing ez and learn to play because this is the only right way to behave when you are anonym. Items addons and offerings are just things to fill the survivor bloodweb, so dont mind losing them because they worth as much as they do after all, wich isnt much even when they are surrounded by the beautifull colours green purple and red.

If you want to have all perks and caracters you just have to spend additionaly about 50€ now and 7€ every quarter year. Of course you can still spend the rest of your life farming shards to buy some caracters but this requires a lot of self hatred and there are still caracters you will need to pay for to play them because this game isnt pay to win and doesnt want to bait you into spending more money at all.

Suming up I can say that the game is "10/01" if you read the actuall ratenumber backwards because this game is really facing a bright future with the very bright devs from behavior studios using the potential their game has as good as brasilia uses its rainforest and I totaly respect Cote Mathieu's big brain being the [strike]game director[/strike] [b]president[/b] of dbd.
Still praying for this game to die.. Soooooon enough

I shit my pants when this game was released for the first time :o

Gran juego. Muy entretenido tanto jugando solo como con amigos...no se puede decir lo mismo de todos los juegos. Me encanta las mecánicas y la forma en la que esta hecho este juego. Es genial que tanto el asesino como los supervivientes sean personas y no llevamos por la maquina. Esto mete un componente de aleatoriedad y de sentir que todo puede cambiar en un segundo maravilloso. 

Tiene sus fallos por supuesto. Uno de ellos son los bugs que aparecen y pueden arruinarte partidas. También que a veces el lobby se hace infinito y los desequilibrios que tienen algunos personajes. Pero el equipo desarrollador parece que se esta poniendo las pilas para arreglarlo todo.

Un gran acierto incluir como asesino a Michael Myers, ya que trae recuerdos de sus películas y es genial. También me parece muy acertado el dlc gratuito del  Left 4 Dead, magnifico ese Bill y la ropa.

Espero que continúen como hasta ahora y sigan sumando jugadores.

Os dejo un enlace sobre mi análisis de este juego en youtube por si os interesa. También hay partidas por si queréis echarles un vistazo.

Dead by Daylight es un juego con una idea novedosa, podriamos decir que casi unico en su estilo.

Nos adentramos en los Reinos, una variedad de mapas con diferentes escenografias que contienen elementos que te ayudaran a sortear la vida o la muerte, es aqui donde debes poner tus sentidos en alerta maxima, tu vista, tu oido, tu capacidad de reacción y por sobre todo la toma de desiciones rapidas y efectivas, haran que tu experiencia sea bastante realista, una ambientación tensa sumado a una buena banda sonora, mas las diferentes situaciones en las que te encuentres te daran una sensación de angustia, compañerismo, heroismo o tu sed de sangre.

Si bien ya debes conocer la premicia basica, en la cual cuatro sobrevivientes se enfrentan a un asesino, posiblemente te deje pensando en desventajas numericas, pero te podras imaginar lo terrorifico que sería que te encierren en un cuarto oscuro junto a un maniatico armado, y es esa justamente la situación que te encontraras en cada escenario. Tu y tus compañeros deberan activar la energia electrica del lugar, para abrir la unica salida de escape y por esa razon el trabajo en equipo será fundamental para tu supervivencia.

Por otra parte si estas del otro lado y eres tu aquel hijo de las sombras, dispuesto a sacear tu sed de sangre, los Reinos serán tu campo de juegos preferido, entra dispuesto acechar y perseguir tu presa, hasta alcanzarla y desatar tu furia sobre su alma, hasta sacrificarla y que sea consumida por el ente.

Суть игры - повесить на крюк четырех сурвов. Казалось бы, у тебя есть оружие, а они безоружны - превосходство налицо. Однако у сурвов есть сверхмощное оружие, способное избить маньяка до полусмерти и унизить его много раз. Это доски.
11 досок в лицо из 10

Es un juego muy entretenido, a pesar de la simpleza de su planteamiento. Básicamente, viene a ser un escondite o un piya piya pero con tono de terror, al más estilo uso de "escape".
Los mapas, aunque se repiten en ambientación, siempre son diferentes en localización de objetivos, las caracteristicas y la forma de jugar de tus compañeros varía y la partida siempre es diferente. Astucia, desarrollo personalizado y mucha sangre fria es lo que se necesita en este juego.
Es verdad que cada vez que meten un nuevo dlc, hay bugs (Como en todos los juegos) pero en general es bastante estable, y los solucionan rápido (En menos de una semana han arreglado todos sos problemas). Además, con el juego básico ya tienes muchísimas horas de diversión.
Recomendado.

玩了2月有余的黎明杀机，对我而言，是一个战胜自我恐惧的过程。
    当我初次接触的时候，很恐惧屠夫和心跳，听到心跳就很害怕一直跑啊跑，尽量远离恐怖的屠夫，因为我知道我被屠夫追到的下场就是被挂到钩子上或是倒地流血而死甚至被处决。被挂起来的感觉就像是屠夫在炫耀自己的战利品一样。
    我认为除了被处决的镜头之外，最恐怖的体验莫过于躲在衣柜胆战心惊的等待屠夫放弃寻找潜在的逃生者的时候，被屠夫从衣柜揪出来的绝望感觉了，直接上钩！
    玩着玩着，这种恐惧感变得熟悉而麻木，通过自身的思考和队友的交流，应对屠夫的逃跑方法的也渐渐掌握。当然，修理发电机反应速度、技能检验的成功率也是处理的很好了。帮助队友逃生的一些方法和救人时机也掌握了一些技巧。对恐惧情绪的应对有了很大进步。
    对这个游戏没有那么大的恐惧的时候，就是战胜了自己情绪的关键。知晓自己的目标和行为目的。通过积累的血点，得到一些有用的逃生者技能，对地图的熟悉以及一些关键地形，板子和窗户的记忆和逃跑路线的摸索看红光等等技巧，就能很从容地修理发电机，溜鬼，救人等等。为自己或者队友争取最大的逃生几率。从而“逃出生天”！哈哈！
    个人不太擅长屠夫，因为听到惨叫个人感觉自己太残忍了...无冤无仇不忍心在游戏里杀死别人，大部分最后故意地道放走一个，（遇到人皇的时候也是会抓不到很烦恼233），我不太符合这个游戏屠夫该有的心理特点，也没有在全部献祭之后特别的成就感和快感。
    PS:不得不说一些超近距离贴脸守尸的玩法（个人感觉很无耻，也暴露了屠夫的游戏能力不自信的特点），bug，各类外挂，脚本，刷血点，屠夫不充当屠夫角色为了个人意愿反而与逃生者PY交易影响恐怖游戏体验等等让人游戏体验超差的行为。官方打击力度应该加大。
      总之，希望杀机越来越好！
      如果你想体验像恐怖电影里那种的追逐与刺激，这款游戏是个不错的选择！（有多种屠夫供你“消遣”）
